title: Dale crossed the rock road standing after the residents of Bismarck said no?
subtitle: As conflicts and protests continued on the access line Dakota, rumors emerged that the pipeline had been diverted after the residents of Bismarck refused to take risks.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The DAPL pipeline was reoriented through the fixed rock reserve after most of the white residents of Bismarck refused to allow it near their water supply.
